response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This price reflects its worth while also allowing us to share the value it brings with you. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 12000}
